sentences: The band started making music in 2002, and disbanded in 2007.
The band, released their self-produced debut album, "How Many Eyes Have Opened" in November 2003.
After several US tours, they recorded a split extended play, with Skylines, Blood & Ink Split Series Vol. 1, that came out on June 21, 2005.
Their final studio album, The Consequence of Revenge, was released on November 7, 2006, by Blood and Ink Records.
